page.title: 09The Shops in Gotherington
page.content: There are two shops in our area.They are both owned by the same family.The main shop is a post office and a general store,the other is a butchers/ bric-a-brac.The two shops are on Cleeve Road in Gotherington.The shops have been in existance for fifty one years. The busiest days in the main shop are Thursday and Friday.It sells a variety of things including newspapers,food, pens, first aid,cigarettes and drinks. Fifty percent of the people using the shop come from outside the village. They have new stock brought in every week. They get their supplies from Birmingham, Cheltenham and other parts of Gloucestershire.The people who run the shop think that future trading will remain static.
